author: Albert S. Crockett
description: The original recipe was actually 2/3rds genever to 1/3 sweet vermouth but this produces an overly dry cocktail so I've upped the proportion of vermouth to genever. Made with a quality genever oude this cocktail is almost nutty and makes for an interesting aperitif.
name: Turf Club Cocktail (Crockett's recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
